cause.description:
The Arthritis Foundation is the nation's only non profit dedicated to the cure of arthritis and related diseases.
Want to help 46 million people in just ten minutes? Visit www.arthritis.org/advocacy and ask your Congressmen and Senators to get our bill into Markup in 2008.
1. To Prevent: by providing education to people about taking steps to prevent osteoarthritis
2. To control: by providing networks, support and programming for children and adults who have arthritis.
3. To Cure: By funding cutting edge research so that we can one day eliminate arthritis.
cause.mission: improve lives through through leadership in the prevention, control and cure of arthritis and related diseases.
